A Maverick Blog

Blogs are useful tools. They help anyone convey information that would otherwise be kept stored in our thoughts. Of course, there is the monetary aspect as incentive to create content. However, I create content to improve. It is widely known that writing just a little every day(ambitious but doable!) improves communication clarity. The theme for this blog I kept it simple. I share what I think is interesting a any giving point in time. I'm a technical guy, but I like tech leadership. Therefore, my aim is to communicate content to both technical and non-technical individuals that express interest in my written pieces.

12 Jun 2022
